${ModID}:AwakenDeath.NAME: 觉醒
${ModID}:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal !M! 生命 instead 并remove this buff. NL After combat, heals for half as much。

${ModID}:Chronoboost.NAME: 时空加速
${ModID}:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 NL 获得 1 力量 for every 12th card you play。

${ModID}:DefensiveMode.NAME: 防御模式
${ModID}:DefensiveMode.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! Weak。

${ModID}:Execute.NAME: 处决
${ModID}:Execute.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 twice. NL If you are in a Stance, 造成 !D! 点伤害 a third time。

${ModID}:GhostflameStrike.NAME: 鬼火打击
${ModID}:GhostflameStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Channel !M! ${ModID}:Ghostflame。

${ModID}:HyperBeam.NAME: HYPER BEAM
${ModID}:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL At the start of your 下回合, 失去 [E] [E]。
${ModID}:HyperBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL At the start of your 下回合, 失去 [E]。

${ModID}:InvincibleStrength.NAME: Invincible
${ModID}:InvincibleStrength.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! ${ModID}:Invincible. NL If you already had *Invincible, it lasts another turn instead。

${ModID}:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
${ModID}:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL On your 下回合, 获得 [E] 并add *SLIME *CRUSH! to your hand。

${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.NAME: Shaper's Blessing
${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Enter ${ModID}:Ancient。
${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 并!M! Plated Armor. NL Enter ${ModID}:Ancient。

${ModID}:SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!
${ModID}:SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
${ModID}:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 易伤 并remove the target's 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:YouAreMine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 易伤 并!M! Weak, 并remove the target's 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。
